thread.title: Kanye West In Surprise American Idol Audition
thread.title_full: Kanye West In Surprise American Idol Audition

author: news.sky
title: Kanye West In Surprise American Idol Audition
text:
Performing in front of Barack Obama in San Francisco was not enough for Kanye West - he also made a surprise appearance on American Idol at the weekend. After appearing at a Democratic National Committee event, the rapper decided to head over to the studios where auditions for the final series of the talent show were taking place.
West was beaming when he came off stage
West performed his hit Gold Digger for the panel, with his pregnant wife Kim Kardashian backstage.
It is not known if his appearance was a publicity stunt or not but judges Jennifer Lopez, Keith Urban and Harry Connick Jr were left looking stunned.
Kardashian posted a photo on Instagram showing the scene on the producer's camera monitor, saying "SURPRISE".
The verdict on West's performance will be shown when the show airs but Ryan Seacrest, host of the show, posted on Instagram: "Look who's going to Hollywood! #IdolAuditions #kanyewest (sic)"
The caption was written under a photo showing West looking uncharacteristically happy and giving Seacrest a high-five.
As well as hosting American Idol, Seacrest is an executive producer on Kim Kardashian's hit reality show Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
Earlier on Saturday, President Obama offered West some tongue-in-cheek advice after he said he is planning to run for the White House in 2020.
